original_text: You must circumcise all the male servants who work for you in your house. Circumcision will be a mark in your bodies which shows that you accept my covenant. It will continue for all time.
korean_text: 너희 집에서 난 자든지 너희 돈으로 산 자든지 할례를 받아야 하리니 이에 내 언약이 너희 살에 있어 영원한 언약이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: You must circumcise all the male servants
who work for you in your house
Circumcision will be a mark in your bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 할례는 너희 몸에 있는 표가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: which shows that you accept my covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나의 언약을 받아들인다는 것을 보여주는

sentences.original_text: It will continue for all time
